h1: Do you want a text message to confirm your fit note has been received?
hint: It can take up to 24 hours for you to receive a text confirmation of the submission of your fit note (Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm).
form-aria-label: Do you want a text message to confirm your fit note has been received? It can take up to 24 hours for you to receive a text confirmation of the submission of your fit note (Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm).
